content.title: Futkar Sabji, Phal-Phool Vikreta Hetu Taraju, Baat Evan Tokari Sahaayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Futkar Sabji, Phal-Phool Vikreta Hetu Taraju, Baat Evan Tokari Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 15 June 2016. The main objective of the scheme is to empower unorganized workers by providing financial assistance of Cycle or Torch.
benefits: An amount of Rs 700/- (Rs seven hundred only) per beneficiary will be provided for scales, weights and 02 baskets.
eligibility: Applicant must be registered as an unorganized worker in any district of the state.
Applicant must have a minimum age of 18 years.
Applicant should not have received similar benefits from any other schemes.
exclusions: Applicant should not have received similar benefits from any other schemes.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Futkar Sabji, Phal-Phool Vikreta Hetu Taraju, Baat Evan Tokari Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized workers on 15 June 2016.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme is to empower unorganized workers by providing financial assistance for scales, weights and 02 baskets.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: An amount of Rs 700/- (Rs seven hundred only) per beneficiary will be provided for scales, weights and 02 baskets.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the required age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant must have a minimum age of 18 years.

faqs.question: Is the applicant eligible if he already gets similar benefits from any other scheme?
What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then can the applicant apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicants have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the required details and submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicants have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details and submit.
